column1: ##DESCRIPTION=ihdb_allsys_hom=Homozygous variant counts in NGSD independent of the processing system.
##DESCRIPTION=ihdb_allsys_het=Heterozygous variant counts in NGSD independent of the processing system.
##DESCRIPTION=validated=Validation information from the NGSD. Validation results of other samples are listed in brackets!
##DESCRIPTION=comment=Comments from the NGSD. Comments of other samples are listed in brackets!
##DESCRIPTION=gene_info=Gene information from NGSD (inheritance mode, ExAC pLI score).
